welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fallbrook, USA! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its scenic views, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Fallbrook has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations at Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport is a small but modern facility with two concourses and a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport offers a luxurious and convenient experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thermal Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Thermal Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
